channel.title: When i click an item in the shop, i disconnect. Help! [Gif Preview]
channel.description:
[b][size=12pt]Whenever you go into the shop and click on and item (Particularly all vesta, a few barrows, and statius) it disconnects you from the game. I am using a Matrix 667 base loading 681. Help please! [/size] [/b]
[img]http://gifninja.com/animatedgifs/671028/disconnection.gif[/img]
